mehemayi.arawindata pitu pirawimata wishala hakiyawak thiyenawa.pudgalika wi.widyala gana athiwuna wiwadayedi ethuma ekama prashna 2.3k digatama asayi.me gana mage blog eka thula athiwuna wiwadayedi ee prashnawalata athitharam pilithuruda dena ladi.namuth nawathath me mathrukawa kohe ho thanakadi dutuwita “ramachandra namaththagen mama prashna ahuwa eyata uththara naha” kiyamin eyama nawatha nawatha wamarayi.eeta amatharawa kohewath nathi thawath prashna set ekak idiriyata dayi.dan ee prashnawalata pilithuru dunna kiyala hithamu.eeth eelaga blog ekedi me mathakawa aawoth nawatha ohu patan ganne “mama arayagen prashna 3k ahuwa eyata kata uththara naha”kiyagenaya.

saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha me bawa sandahan kale polonnaruwa disthrik sambandhikarana kamitu raswima amathamini.polonnaruwa disthrikkaya pura me wana wita ayale yana ballan 30000 k sitina bawath mema ballan ennath kirimata wasarakata rupiyal koti 3ka mudalak waya wana bawath polonnaruwa pradeshiya saukhya sewa adhyaksha waidya es. en. udugama mahatha prakasha kaleya.mehidi pilithuru dun saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha, dadawathe yana ballan rohalwala waidyawarun pawa sapa kana bawath diwayina pura ballan sapa kamen wasarakata minis jiwitha siya gananak winasha wana bawath amathiwaraya kiya.ballan winasha kirimata nawa nithi awashya nowana bawa sandahan kala amathyawaraya, sathwa awihinsa sanwidhana athnam owun wisin ayale yana ballan bala gatha yuthu yayi da sandahan kaleya.mema raswima amatha, samaja sewa niyojya amathi chandrasiri suriyaaarachchi, disthrik lekam nimal abesiri mahathwaru da katha kalaha..
